usercssData.name: Discord Cyberpunk Neon Transparent
usercssData.author: Roboron
usercssData.description: WARNING: Userstyles no longer supported. Please install via GreasyForkCyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out the Cyberpunk Neon GitHubIf you want to change the background, edit the CSS file and change the URL image (instructions inside).If you like my work you can buy me a ko-fi or support me on liberapay.

usercssData.name: Hide sidebars on StackOverflow and StackExchange
usercssData.description: On the left hand and right hand side of the content on both StackOverflow and StackExchange there are panes of content that exists only to lure the user onto different things than what she was there for. This style removes it.
usercssData.author: Rovanion Luckey

author: Rovanion Luckey
description: On the left hand and right hand side of the content on both StackOverflow and StackExchange there are panes of content that exists only to lure the user onto different things than what she was there for. This style removes it.
name: Hide sidebars on StackOverflow and StackExchange
